page.title: 10A FARMER SON'S SUNDAY
page.content: 7-20am Got out of bed and dressed. 7-30am Washed. 7-40am Went to open the stubble-turnip gate as the cows go in there to eat after they have been milked. 7-48am Helped with the milking by washing down the tanks. 8-03 Hosed down the milking parlour. 8-30am Had breakfast - frosties/milk. 8-50am Watched video of yesterday's T.V. programme The Hunter. 9-50am Went to{Launceston }with Dad for a part for the lawnmower. 1-05pm Had dinner. We had sausages and chips followed by pavlova. 1-40pm Watched the{FARMING PROGRAMME} on T.V. with Dad. 2-00pm Played with my Lego Kit. 3-30pm Went strawberry picking with Mum. 6-00pm Had strawberries/cream for tea.
